title: Cache getKeycardsWithSameKeyUid

milestone.description:
## Messaging & Communities team 

**1. Continue to fix bugs and stabilise chat and communities functionality as top priority**
- includes any issues found during dogfooding

**2. Status Communities / Discord bridge**
- Ensure bridge works with token gated communities (e.g. permission is set at the community level that requires a token to be held to be a member of that community)
- Ensure bridge works with token gated channels
- On the Status Desktop side, individual messages from Discord are displayed as individual messages with Discord usernames

**3. Continue work on profile showcase**

**4. Ability to mark a token gated channel as 'hidden'**
- A token gated channel that's marked as 'hidden' is only visible to community members that have the requisite tokens to access this channel
- Design for this is completed

**5. Fix user flow bugs, better handle edgecases and other improvements**
- Ben to provide designs and links to all associated issues
- Banning / unbanning and kicking: graceful support of edgecases and improvements**




 

## Wallet Team

**1. Fixing bugs, stabilisation of existing functionality**
- 0.17 will be our 1st or 2nd public beta release, so squashing bugs is the top priority
- Includes fully testing Keycard on Windows and fixing any outstanding Windows Keycard issues

**2. Collectables - support graceful support of edgecases and improvements**
- Ben to provide designs and links to all associated issues

**3. Other wallet improvements and improved edgecase support**
- Ben to provide designs and links to all associated issues
- QR code display updates
- Showing user which permissions they loose when they remove an account
- flow for restart required  for JSON RPC change to take effect

**4. Finish improved 'saved accounts' functionality and 'share address' dialogue**

body:
Calling status-go is not free and as such we should avoid making calls to it

```
C:\Users\antho\Documents\GitHub\status-desktop\src\nim_status_client.nim(208) nim_status_client
C:\Users\antho\Documents\GitHub\status-desktop\src\nim_status_client.nim(205) mainProc
C:\Users\antho\Documents\GitHub\status-desktop\vendor\nimqml\src\nimqml\private\qguiapplication.nim(29) exec
C:\Users\antho\Documents\GitHub\status-desktop\vendor\nimqml\src\nimqml\private\qobject.nim(52) qobjectCallback
C:\Users\antho\Documents\GitHub\status-desktop\vendor\nimqml\src\nimqml\private\qobject.nim(37) onSlotCalled
C:\Users\antho\Documents\GitHub\status-desktop\vendor\nimbus-build-system\vendor\Nim\lib\core\macros.nim(564) onSlotCalled
C:\Users\antho\Documents\GitHub\status-desktop\src\app\modules\main\wallet_section\view.nim(91) setFilterAddress
C:\Users\antho\Documents\GitHub\status-desktop\src\app\modules\main\wallet_section\io_interface.nim(18) setFilterAddress
C:\Users\antho\Documents\GitHub\status-desktop\src\app\modules\main\wallet_section\module.nim(201) setFilterAddress
C:\Users\antho\Documents\GitHub\status-desktop\src\app\modules\main\wallet_section\module.nim(183) notifyFilterChanged
C:\Users\antho\Documents\GitHub\status-desktop\src\app\modules\main\wallet_section\accounts\io_interface.nim(20) filterChanged
C:\Users\antho\Documents\GitHub\status-desktop\src\app\modules\main\wallet_section\accounts\module.nim(47) filterChanged
C:\Users\antho\Documents\GitHub\status-desktop\vendor\nimbus-build-system\vendor\Nim\lib\pure\collections\sequtils.nim(386) map
C:\Users\antho\Documents\GitHub\status-desktop\src\app\modules\main\wallet_section\accounts\module.nim(48) :anonymous
C:\Users\antho\Documents\GitHub\status-desktop\src\app\modules\main\wallet_section\accounts\controller.nim(37) isKeycardAccount
C:\Users\antho\Documents\GitHub\status-desktop\src\app_service\service\wallet_account\service_keycard.nim(120) isKeycardAccount
C:\Users\antho\Documents\GitHub\status-desktop\src\app_service\service\wallet_account\service_keycard.nim(109) getKeycardsWithSameKeyUid
```

Each time we switch account we make this call, the result of that could be cache in memory until something is changed
